problem_text_cn: 三棱柱的三视图如图,△EFG中,EF=8cm,EG=12cm,∠EGF=30°,则AB的长为()
problem_text_en: The three views of the triangular prism are shown in the figure, in △EFG, EF = N_0, EG = N_1, ∠EGF = N_2, then the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:过点E作EQ⊥FG于点Q,由题意可得出:EQ=AB,∵EG=12cm,∠EGF=30°,∴EQ=AB=\frac{1}{2}×12=6(cm)．故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了由三视图判断几何体,体现了对空间想象能力方面的考查,根据已知条件得出EQ=AB是解题关键．
